user.description: Enter the file name as displayed on the [Open EPG website](https://www.open-epg.com/app/index.php). Or specify a generated file code if applicable.

channels.description: Choose the channels you want to track from the available list below.

error.no_channels: No channels were found. Please verify the file name or generated code and try again.
error.invalid_file_name: The file name appears to be invalid. Please double-check and try again. Visit the [Open EPG website](https://www.open-epg.com/app/index.php), click on 'Guides by Country' in the top menu, and search for the correct file.

data.file_name: File Name (Or Generated File Code) do not change!

init.description: Enter the file name as displayed on the [Open EPG website](https://www.open-epg.com/app/index.php). Or specify a generated file code if applicable.

channels.description: Choose the channels you want to track from the available list below.

error.no_channels: No channels were found. Please verify the file name or generated code and try again.
